metadata.title: The Impetus of Hunger; the Persistence of Thirst

tracks.text: Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over player characters. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of a red-bricked town. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back in the ruins.
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
A ninja runs at night through the ruins.
Professor in library
Psyger-100 in town
Emul runs from SF Zoo
Bilac hammers in a forge. Amariys sips coffee. A woman and man stand on a roof near satellite dishes.
A computer sits in the Utopia reference room.
Sunraku flies through the crystal nest fighting scorpions.
Sunraku flies through the Ruins, fighting golems.
A mecha stares up. Blue and red mecha fly around and fight. The pink haired woman is in the red mecha.
A spiky golem in the ruins.
The Gatekeeper's arms glow blue.
A lava crystal scorpion
A blue haired ninja girl makes hand signals.
Sunraku stares up at agiant mountain of metal trash.
Pencilgon swings a golden spear.
Katzo red fist punches the Gatekeeper.
Psyger-0 holds a sword and takes her dark form.
Sunraku wears a mask and holds crystal arm guns.
Clouds cover the moon.
A shadowy wolf lunges from the darkness.
Crystal scorpions slide over a precipice into a pit.
Sunraku drives a marsh dagger into the side of the pit.
Scorpions fall into the darkness.
Text, 30, The impetus of hunger; the persistence of thirst
He looks down, where the scorpions disappeared into the darkness.
A scorpion approaches from behind.
The scorpion quakes. It tenses, being crushed between yellow and red, giant crystal scorpion pincers.
The plain crystal scorpions shatter.
Sunraku, sweating, takes a step back.
A giant, golden scorpion moves crystal shards away, towering over Sunraku.
Label, Rare Enemy, Goldy Scorpion
Goldy tosses a crystal scorpion. It bounces and falls into the pit. Sunraku runs.
Goldy gains on him.
He equips moon blades and strikes a pincer.
He buffs himself and perches on a shard. Goldy swipes, slicing above him.
Sunraku dodges and swing and runs.
In his mind, he compares the pincers to Psyger-0's giant sword
He strikes, leaving no mark.
Goldy swings. Sunraku dodges parries dodges parries and slides back near the pit.
The scorpion raises its stinger and shoots a stream of purple goo.
He looks back at the purple goo where he had stood.
He jumps back, Goldy smashes his perch, he leaps and flies overhead.
He lands on a shard. Goldy turns and raises its stinger.
The poison spreads out like a net
Purple goo splatters around the shard, filling our view.
The Inventoria.
Sunraku, Level 79, max HP, no MP. He opens his item list.
He lands next to a corroded crystal shard.
He dodges right then left then runs.
Goldy gains on him. While running, he parries swipes.
Goldy leaps up and back, to the top of a high shard.
It spreads its pincers wide and looks up at the crescent moon. Goldy glows green, and its wound closes.
Goldy looks down at him from above.
Sunraku runs straight up the shard.
Under the moon, Sunraku fights Goldy. He parries, dodges, strikes, dodges, parries, strikes, parries, strikes, all while pressing Goldy back.
Goldy strikes. He dodges and ricochets off a shard.
He strikes between tail segments.
The tail bats him away
His sword cracks
He lands in the crystal nest.
The scorpion spreads its pincers.
He equips a marsh dagger.
He throws it.
The scorpion recoils and shakes.
He punches the dagger.
The scorpion flies off the perch
He jumps down.
Goldy looks up.
He drives the sword into the joint under the stinger.
He slices through.
The stinger goes flying
He jumps and grabs the stinger.
He lands on the ground and turns around.
Goldy roars and hits the ground.
Goldy engulfs in flames.
Flying bits of crystal bounce of crystal shards.
Plain crystal scorpions surround Sunraku.
Goldy charges.
Sunraku skates between the pincers and under Goldy.
Goldy turns around, burning.
Goldy races after him.
He throws chunks and shards, and dozens more scorpions appear.
Goldy pursues amidst a herd of scorpions.
Endless scorpions pile on top of Goldy
He lands in the crystal nest and looks up at a golden crystal scorpion pincer.
He looks at his reflection. Behind him looms a burning red pincer.
He dodges.
Goldy is scratched and cracked and burning with wild, crimson flames. Fire laps between the joints of his carapace. It looms over him.
He equips moon twin blade.
Goldy swipes. Sunraku dodges.
He leaps out of the way.
He flies overhead
Goldy shoots a blast of red energy.
He equips an egg shaped stone.
The idol rolls and stops in front of Goldy.
The idol rights itself, then waves its arms. It dances a little jig. Goldy watches.
It finishes.
and explodes.
